snippet: Five months after Linsanity took New York and the N.B.A. by storm, it’s possible the Knicks may decide not to match Jeremy Lin’s three-year, $25.1 million offer sheet from Houston.
abstract: Howard Beck On Pro Basketball column notes that five months after Linsanity took New York and the NBA by storm, it is possible that the New York Knicks may decide not to match Jeremy Lin’s three-year, $25.1 million offer sheet from the Houston Rockets.
lead_paragraph: Five months after Linsanity took New York and the N.B.A. by storm, it’s possible the Knicks may decide not to match Jeremy Lin’s three-year, $25.1 million offer sheet from Houston.

headline.seo: Jeremy Lin May Not Return to the Knicks
headline.main: Growing Doubts on Lin’s Return to the Knicks
headline.print_headline: Growing Doubts On Lin’s Return To the Knicks
